com.nuance.android.vocalizer

Class VocalizerSpeechMark

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nuance.android.vocalizer.VocalizerSpeechMark
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class VocalizerSpeechMark
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Wraps information about a speech mark event that occurs during speech synthesis.

    During speech synthesis, several events will fire, such as reaching a specific bookmark in the text, reaching the position of a word, phoneme, etc.

    Clients can register to receive such events by calling setSpeechMarkListener When receiving a speech mark event, you should first check the type of event by calling getType and then calling methods in this class to get specific information about the event.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nuance Communications
